de.systemagmbh.interfaces.table
Interface ISysTable

All Superinterfaces:
ISysComponent, ISysCursoredTable, ISysExtendableTable, ISysMessageConvertable, ISysTableModel
All Known Implementing Classes:
DummyISysTable
public interface ISysTable
extends ISysComponent, ISysMessageConvertable, ISysCursoredTable, ISysExtendableTable

This is the definition of a table for usage as container for results of database selects (ResultSet). It can also be created out of a ISysMessage if the ISysMessage was created out of a ISysTable.
To fill in an object that is not an ISysTableModel you have to write an adapter class that implements ISysTableModel and has a constructor that has the object of interest as argument.

Version:
$Revision: 1.6 $
Author:
Udo Friedrich

Method Detail

init

public void init(ISysTableModel table)
          throws CSysTableException
Create a ISysTable out of a ISysTableModel.

Parameters:
table - A ISysTableModel.
Throws:
CSysTableException - if the table can not be generated for any reason.

init

public void init(ISysMessage msg)
          throws CSysTableException,
                 CSysMessageException
Create a ISysTable out of a ISysMessage. This will only work if the given ISysMessage was created out of a the same implementation of ISysTable.

Parameters:
msg - A ISysMessage.
Throws:
CSysTableException - if the table can not be generated for any reason.
CSysMessageException - if reading the table fails for any reason.
